Authors and Citation

Authors

  • Austin G. McCoy. Author, conceptor.

  • Zachary Noel. Author, conceptor.

  • Adam H. Sparks. Author, maintainer.

  • Martin Chilvers. Author, thesis advisor.

  • Jari Oksanen. Author.
    Contributed fix for the use of 'vegan' in betadiversity vignette.

  • Zhian N. Kamvar. Contributor, reviewer.

  • Michigan Soybean Promotion Committee. Funder, copyright holder.

  • Project GREEEN. Funder, copyright holder.

  • North Central Soybean Research Program. Funder, copyright holder.

  • Grains Research and Development Corporation. Funder, copyright holder.
    GRDC Project DAQ00186 and GRDC Project CUR2210-005OPX (AAGI-CU)

  • Michigan State University. Funder, copyright holder.
    MSU AgBioResearch and MSU Extension

  • University of Southern Queensland. Funder, copyright holder.

  • Curtin University. Funder, copyright holder.

Citation

Source: inst/CITATION

McCoy AG, Noel ZA, Sparks AH, Chilvers M (2019). “hagis, an R Package Resource for Pathotype Analysis of Phytophthora sojae Populations Causing Stem and Root Rot of Soybean.” Molecular Plant-Microbe Interactions, 32(12), 1574–1576. doi:10.1094/MPMI-07-19-0180-A, https://doi.org/10.1094/MPMI-07-19-0180-A.
